education_text.0: She served on the math and computer science faculty at several other universities, including      Tufts University Tufts University, the      University of Southern California University of Southern California,      Florida International University Florida International University, and the      redirect    Georgia Institute of Technology Georgia Institute of Technology (Georgia Tech), prior to joining the MIT faculty in 1982She is the author of numerous research articles about distributed algorithms and impossibility results, and about formal modeling and validation of distributed systems (see, e
